mapper.insert: insert into music_info (songId, title, author, album, URL) values (#{musicInfo.songId}, #{musicInfo.title}, #{musicInfo.author}, #{musicInfo.album}, #{musicInfo.URL})

insert into musci_comment(songId, nickname, likedCount, content, time) values
(#{comment.songId},#{comment.nickName},#{comment.likedCount},#{comment.content},#{comment.time})
